entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Iqaluit
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 23. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of light snow overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 20 in the evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 17.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 17. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 17. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 11. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Monday 13 March 2023
